resources.string: Do you want to calibrate Loomo now?

Calibration: Loomo will drive 1 meter forward to calibrate. 
 You can always press the app logo to return to the front page
 Navigation:

" 1. When you press the 'Start Navigation'-button, you get redirected to the page where you select what room you are going to. 
 2. Start by selecting what building the room is in, then select what floor the room is at, and finally, type in the ending number of your room.
 3. Press 'FIND PATH TO ROOM'. Loomo will now find a route the room.
 4. Press the play button to make loomo start navigating.

 This is an example of a room number: C2 036. Where C is the building name, 2 is what floor the room is located at, and 036 is the room number.

;
